about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of adult business. In the exciting game "SMETANKA", become a star of virtual entertainment. Encourage your virtual fans and recruit new ones by completing orders for donat, which will bring you funds to open new poses and toys. The mood of your audience and your place in the top depends on your actions.
A well-thought-out fan system and great animations will not let you get bored, and charming music will give you an atmosphere. Your attention will be riveted for a long time to the piquant scenes of the game.
Photo mode will allow you to capture your favorite moments without missing the details.
Conquer new horizons of pleasure!




Features:
- Nice graphics
- Excellent soundtrack
- Easy gameplay
- Beautiful animations
-Photo Mode

highlighted.name: Oh it looks like it's going to rain :)
And the watermelon is ripe and very sweet!

Any chat names appearing in this game are fictitious. Any resemblance to real names, organizations, places, events, etc. is purely coincidental.
● This game is only intended for an adult audience 18 years of age or older. Purchasing and playing by minors under the age of 18 is strictly prohibited.
● All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the world of adult business. In the exciting game "SMETANKA", become a star of virtual entertainment. Encourage your virtual fans and recruit new ones by completing orders for donat, which will bring you funds to open new poses and toys. The mood of your audience and your place in the top depends on your actions.
A well-thought-out fan system and great animations will not let you get bored, and charming music will give you an atmosphere. Your attention will be riveted for a long time to the piquant scenes of the game.
Photo mode will allow you to capture your favorite moments without missing the details.

name: SMETANKA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Serise or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Serise or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
